mapper.insert: insert into reply (replyId, userId, pointId, topicId, createTime, zanCount, opposeCount, enable) values (#{replyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zancount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opposecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT})
